name: PROJECT A (BlueRaven)
description:
PROJECT A is a small bullet hell game built in Monogame intended to show off my skills at creating games in a limited timeframe. This game was developed over the course of a three or so weeks. Inspired by realm of the mad god. Don't expect too much - it's all programmer art and has no real mechanics to speak of, aside from point and shoot.

Controls:

Click - Shoot

Space - Roll (also reloads)

R - Heal
